mapper.select:
select id, name, createAt, createTime, updateAt, updateTime from func_class
and createAt = ${ew.createAt}
and name like concat('%', #{ew.name}, '%')
and date_format(createTime,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{ew.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(createTime,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{ew.endTime},'%y%m%d')
select id, name, createAt, createTime, updateAt, updateTime from func_class as fc left join func_blog_class as fbc on fc.id = fbc.classId where fbc.blogId = #{id}
